text: Then I used my mind to examine the attraction2:3. The word used means to “draw” or “attract.” of wine to my body. My mind still guiding me with wisdom, I took it until I acted like a fool,2:3. Some believe that this means the Teacher became drunk in this “experiment.” The phrase is literally, “I grasped (it) until folly.” so that I might see whether this was good for people to do during their time here.
